xml.name: Extract Method
xml.Try: Extract Method is a refactoring that lets you encapsulate a code selection into a new method, with customizable parameters and return type. Let's extract some lines of code into a new setup function. Press ExtractMethod.
xml.Text: When extracting a method in , you can change its signature. Click one of the parameters in the Parameters section and use AllIcons.General.ArrowUp/AllIcons.General.ArrowDown icons to change the order of parameters. Change their names by clicking the parameter row.
xml.Try: Now press ExtractMethod and try changing the signature of the extracted method.
